[Contact Us](http://haskelltexasusa.com/contact-us/)

The Haskell police department is located on Highway 380 in the old City Hall office building. The department is directed by Chief of Police Kenny Barnett and four full-time officers:
**Nick Shaginaw, Jason Hull, Robert Garcia and Harry Steen, Jr.**

**KENNY BARNETT – CHIEF OF POLICE**

301 S. 1st
Haskell, TX 79521 • (940) 864-2333
301 S. 1st • P.O. Box 1003
Haskell, TX 79521 • (940) 864-2333
